productsPage.title: All Products
productsPage.subtitle: Manage your product catalog
productsPage.accessDenied: You don't have permission to view products.

notification.deletePermission: You don't have permission to delete products
notification.duplicatePermission: You don't have permission to duplicate products
notification.statusPermission: You don't have permission to change product status
notification.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

productsCreate.title: Add New Product
productsCreate.subtitle: Create a new product with variants
productsCreate.enablePreorderDescription: Allow customers to order this product before it's in stock
productsCreate.featuredImageDescription: Main product image displayed in catalog and product detail pages
productsCreate.priceStockVariantsDescription: You can add variants to a product that has more than one option, such as size or color.
productsCreate.defaultValuesDescription: These values will be applied to all newly generated variants
productsCreate.selectVariantTypes: Select Variant Types to Generate Combinations
productsCreate.noVariantTypes: No variant types available. Add variant types from
productsCreate.productHighlightsPlaceholder: Enter key product highlights, features, benefits...
productsCreate.highlightsTip: Add key product highlights, features, or benefits. Click Add to create more items.
productsCreate.richTextTip: Tip: Use the formatting toolbar to add bold, italic, underline, lists, and links. Rich text editing is fully supported.
productsCreate.seoTitlePlaceholder: Best Product Name for SEO - Your Brand
productsCreate.seoTitleTip: Recommended: 50-60 characters. This appears in search results.
productsCreate.seoDescriptionPlaceholder: A compelling description that encourages users to click...
productsCreate.seoDescriptionTip: Recommended: 120-160 characters. This appears below your title in search results.
productsCreate.seoTagsTip: Comma-separated search keywords. Examples: product type, features, benefits, use cases.
productsCreate.previewTip1: Title appears in blue and links to your page
productsCreate.previewTip2: Description appears below the title in gray
productsCreate.previewTip3: URL is automatically generated from the title

notification.atLeastOneVariant: At least one variant is required
notification.defaultValuesAppliedMessage: Applied default values to all {{count}} variants
notification.noVariantTypesSelectedMessage: Please select at least one variant type
notification.noValuesSelectedMessage: Please select at least one value for "{{name}}"

attributesPage.title: Attributes
attributesPage.subtitle: Manage product attributes (Warranty, Origin, Dimensions, etc.)

form.name: Attribute Name
form.nameDescription: Unique identifier for this attribute (use lowercase, no spaces)
form.displayNamePlaceholder: e.g., Warranty Period, Country of Origin
form.displayNameDescription: User-friendly name shown on forms and storefront
form.typeDescription: Type of input for this attribute
form.isRequiredDescription: Whether this attribute must have a value
